summary: Which federal agency looks out for your financial interests? Where do you turn to improve your financial education? The Bureau of Consumer Financial Protection works to enhance financial education and ensure banks, lenders, and other financial companies treat citizens fairly. Each year, we audit the Bureau's financial statements and issue an opinion on them, as well as on the effectiveness of the Bureau's internal controls...
title: Financial Audit: Bureau of Consumer Financial Protection's FY 2020 and FY 2019 Financial Statements
